title: Who is the most powerful female singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you mean type of singer or actual person? The most powerful type of female singer is a dramatic soprano. in terms of individual singers I think of Birgit Nielsson, Dame Eva Turner, Jane Eaglen. Right now I think one of the most powerful (and wonderful ) voices in the world is a dramatic mezzo soprano Anita Rachvelishvili
As far as singing,Beyonce, Mariah Carey,Whitney Houston or Patti Labelle .There are probably many more I forgot.
